channel.title: .:Error With run.bat (NOT JAVA!):
channel.description:
I am making shops for my server. I made the autospawn characters. Now when I click run.bat this error comes up:
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndesOutOfBoundsException: 5 at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:56) at NPCHander.<init><NPCHandler.java:56> at server.main(server.java:28) Godpurage v2 is now... ONLINE W00T!
The Autospawn Code thing is: spawn = 549 3081 3509 0 0 0 0 0 1
I tried to log on, but it was black and went back to the sign on menu. Someone, please help me!!!

item.title: .:Error With run.bat (NOT JAVA!):
item.dc:creator: @RuneScape_2 RuneScape 2
item.description:
@RuneScape_2 wrote:

well first godpurage sucks.
second - spawn = 549 3081 3509 0 0 0 0 0 1 shop
and if its like that go to npchandler and press ctrl G and type in 56 and post whats around there
